title: Lowe's Pickup Today Scraper
description: Scrape 'Pickup Today' inventory from Lowe's stores in Washington and Oregon. Optimized for cost efficiency using sequential context rotation.

stores.title: Stores to Scrape
stores.description: List of store objects with store_id, name, city, state, zip. Leave empty to scrape ALL 49 WA/OR stores.

categories.title: Categories to Scrape
categories.description: List of category objects with name and url. Leave empty to use all 24 high-value departments.

max_pages_per_category.title: Max Pages Per Category
max_pages_per_category.description: Maximum pagination pages per category (24 items/page). Lower = faster/cheaper. Default 50 pages = 1,200 items max per category.
